title: ion-label
body: Label is a wrapper element that can be used in combination with
, and more. The position of the label inside of an item can be inline, fixed, stacked, or floating.

angular:
Multi-line text that should wrap when it is too long
    to fit on one line in the item.
javascript:
Multi-line text that should wrap when it is too long
    to fit on one line in the item.
react:
Multi-line text that should wrap when it is too long
        to fit on one line in the item.
stencil:
Multi-line text that should wrap when it is too long
          to fit on one line in the item.
vue:
Multi-line text that should wrap when it is too long
      to fit on one line in the item.

props.name: color
props.docs: The color to use from your application's color palette. Default options are: "primary", "secondary", "tertiary", "success", "warning", "danger", "light", "medium", and "dark". For more information on colors, see theming.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: position
props.docs: The position determines where and how the label behaves inside an item.

docs: Label is a wrapper element that can be used in combination with `ion-item`, `ion-input`, `ion-toggle`, and more. The position of the label inside of an item can be inline, fixed, stacked, or floating.

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp
